channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 4th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed best out of hours please replace x1 broken raised 600x600x20mm slab number 1 (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 4th April
item.description:
Pothole on Noverton Lane, on the left just after passed turning into a Roberts Road, going towards Prestbury village. Looks like breakdown of previous repair possibly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Noverton Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
